name: How To Convert Pdf To Ppt Online for Free
description: In this video, you will learn how to convert a PDF file to PPT in a few minutes

step.text: To convert a PDF file to PPT, first select file and click on the “Choose file” button or drag and drop your PDF document in our online PDF to PPT converter.You can also choose file from Google Drive or Dropbox.
step.name: Choose File

step.text: button and wait a few moments. The files are processed over the Internet and it takes no more than a few moments to convert a PDF document to a PowerPoint slide file
